import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { closePopup } from '../features/form/popupFormSlice' import { addThought } from '../features/thought/thoughtSlice' let id = 0 function ThoughtForm () { const dispatch = useDispatch() const popupForm = useSelector(state=> state.popupForm.value) const handleClick = () => { id++ const title = document.getElementById('title').value const content = document.getElementById('content').value const thought = { id, title, content } dispatch(addThought(thought)) dispatch(closePopup()) } console.log(thoughts) return (
{ popupForm &&


}
) } export default ThoughtForm
